trans-unit.source: Recognizes ink gestures.
trans-unit.target: 會辨識筆墨筆勢。

trans-unit.source: A GestureRecognizer identifies an ink gesture.
trans-unit.target: GestureRecognizer 識別筆墨筆勢。

trans-unit.source: You can set the GestureRecognizer to recognize all or a subset of application gestures.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定辨識 GestureRecognizer 的全部或子集的應用程式的筆勢。

trans-unit.source: To set the GestureRecognizer to recognize a subset of the available gestures, pass an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> array to the constructor or use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定 GestureRecognizer 辨識可用的筆勢的子集，傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>陣列建構函式或使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> contains a gesture, call the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>包含鍵筆勢，而呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字使用量您無法使用此類別中的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When it is created with this constructor, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes all application gestures.
trans-unit.target: 當它使用這個建構函式，建立<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>辨識所有應用程式的筆勢。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the GestureRecognizer constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> that recognizes a subset of the application gestures.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立使用 GestureRecognizer 建構函式<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>，會辨識應用程式筆勢的子集。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that specifies the application gestures the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> will recognize.
trans-unit.target: 類型的陣列<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref>指定應用程式筆勢<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref>會辨識。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you finish using the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, after calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在呼叫 Dispose 之後, 您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>所佔用。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 取得筆勢<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref>辨識。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that contains gestures the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> is set to recognize.
trans-unit.target: 類型的陣列<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref>包含手勢<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref>設辨識。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean that indicates whether the gesture recognizer is available on the user's system.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指出是否為使用者的系統上可用的筆勢辨識器。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the recognition component is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果辨識元件功能。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Looks for gestures in the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 尋找在指定的筆勢<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the Recognize method is sorted by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 辨識方法所傳回的陣列依照<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, Recognize may return a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> array with the following values: |Index|ApplicationGesture|RecognitionConfidence| |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |0|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |1|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |2|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |3|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes that it is very likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a check mark, relatively likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in not a gesture, and not at all likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a curlicue or a double curlicue.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，辨識可能會傳回下列值的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>陣列: |索引 |ApplicationGesture |RecognitionConfidence | |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |&0; |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&1; |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&2; |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&3; |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| 這表示，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>就很可能是可辨識的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>核取記號，可能會相當的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>中不鍵筆勢，和完全不可能，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>花體或 double 花體。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Recognize method can return an array with <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> at a higher <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> than other application gestures.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 辨識的方法可以傳回的陣列<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>較高<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>比其他應用程式的筆勢。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>

trans-unit.source: This means that it is more likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is not a gesture, as opposed to a gesture that has a lower <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.
trans-unit.target: 這表示很有可能會<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>是不手勢，而不是具有較低<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>筆勢</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to search for gestures.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>搜尋手勢。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult"></xref> that contains application gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognized.
trans-unit.target: 類型的陣列<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult"> </xref> ，其中包含應用程式的筆勢<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref>辨識。

trans-unit.source: Sets the application gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 設定應用程式筆勢<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref>辨識。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that specifies the application gestures you wish the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> to recognize.
trans-unit.target: 類型的陣列<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"> </xref> ，指定您希望應用程式筆勢<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref>辨識。
